tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE A_B_Testing ( 
  test_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  user_id INT NOT NULL, 
  test_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, 
  design_variation VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
  layout_variation VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
  ui_element_variation VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
  user_experience_rating INT 
);

CREATE TABLE ab_tests (
    test_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    test_name VARCHAR(255),
    test_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE test_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    test_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    version VARCHAR(50),
    is_conversion BOOLEAN,
    conversion_value FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (test_id) REFERENCES ab_tests(test_id)
);

CREATE TABLE website_users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    user_gender VARCHAR(10),
    user_age INT,
    signup_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE website_experiments (
    experiment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE user_interactions (
    interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    experiment_id UUID,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    registration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Experiments (
    experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    experiment_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ExperimentResults (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    experiment_id INT,
    variation_chosen INT,
    conversion_event VARCHAR(50),
    result_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES Experiments(experiment_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Variations (
    variation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    variation_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    variation_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    event_description TEXT
)
